teams.name: Marie Forleo's Kiva Lending Team
teams.whereabouts: Global Baby!  HQ in NYC & LA
teams.loan_because: We're uber passionate about making a difference.  Nothing makes us more excited than using our skills and resources to increase prosperity, aliveness and well-being on the planet.
teams.description: We're a global group of creators committed to doing our best work, giving back and having a GREAT time while we do it!  Wanna join us? Requirements:  a can-do-attitude, sense of humor, a passion for possibility, and burning desire to use your creativity to be of service!

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: EL FARO DEL CANTÁBRICO
teams.loan_because:
We want to return to life all it has given to us. Responsibility and social justice. We admire entreprising people, we believe in people. Effort, work and dignity.

Queremos devolver a la vida todo lo que nos ha dado. Responsabilidad y justicia social. Admiramos a la gente emprendedora, creemos en las personas. Esfuerzo, trabajo y dignidad.
teams.description:
We feel ourselves compromised with people.

Nos sentimos comprometidos con las personas.

teams.name: Snow
teams.loan_because: We care

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Rockmont Farm
teams.description: We are a team of summer campers and friends that use our profits from selling farm produce from the Rockmont Farm to lend to farmers around the world.

teams.name: Rockmont Staff
teams.loan_because:
It's not how large your share is,
But how much you can share.
teams.description: We are a community that seeks to build boys into young men who contribute at home, school, and at work. Part of that includes sharing the good gifts that God has already given us, whatever form that may take.

teams.name: SuperFam Cope
teams.loan_because: We want to help people who need money so we can make the world a better place.
teams.description: We are a fun-loving family of two parents and two young boys in southern Wisconsin, United States.  We started making loans on Kiva and created this team to help hard-working people around the world achieve their financial goals.  We asked our relatives living around the United States to join our team and donate to Kiva instead of buying presents for us at holidays.  We hope our team eventually will make a positive difference in many people's lives around the world.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.loan_because: We have the priviledge of working, studying, teaching and living at one of the best universities in the world and Kiva is one of the finest ways to help others share in our priviledges

www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.loan_because: We believe that we are called by Christ to be a light to those in need.
teams.description: A community of Christians in Calgary who are passionate about serving others.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Khomota
teams.loan_because: there is no them
teams.description: Khomota Kiva is an association dedicated to promoting the empowerment of the impoverished through effective microfinancing techniques.  All members who decide to join carry the responsibility of promoting microfinancing as a whole and providing whatever sort of donation they can to make their own individual impacts across the world.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Lending Librarians
teams.loan_because: Without food, who can afford books?  Without knowledge, what good is income?  Plus, librarians are natural lenders!

teams.name: BWFA integrates investments
teams.loan_because: BWFA is a nationally recognized wealth management firm providing objective advice since 1986. BWFA integrates investments, retirement and estate planning with tax strategies so you can rest easy and enjoy your money.
teams.description: BWFA is a nationally recognized wealth management firm providing objective advice since 1986. BWFA integrates investments, retirement and estate planning with tax strategies so you can rest easy and enjoy your money.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Singapore
teams.loan_because: every effort matters, every offered hand deserves another, and any contribution counts.
teams.description: Our efforts might be small but they're a big difference to someone else, and ever so worth it.

teams.name: Expand HCM
teams.loan_because: It's our mission to stimulate entrepreneurship and to connect people. In our business we do that in the Human Resources field. At KIva we do it for our fellow human beings.
teams.description: We are a young and professional team of highly motivated people who like to, besides make money, make a difference.

teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: People's Forum's Friends Club
teams.whereabouts: Anywhere in the world that supports entrepreneurs and livelihood loans in rural India
